long_description: The Coleman All Purpose First-Aid Tin includes 27 of the most commonly used first-aid items. It's great for home, in the car or on the trail. Includes six 3 x 1 in. bandages, 4 small bandages, 2 butterfly bandages, 2 spot bandages, 2 knuckle bandages, 3 antiseptic wipes and 2 sting relief wipes. Also includes 1 large safety pin, 1 small safety point, 2 antibiotic ointments, 1 razor blade and a reusable storage tin. Brushed metal tin has a hinged top; crush-resistant tin protects the contents. Embossed first-aid cross for easy identification in the dark.
short_description: The Coleman All Purpose First-Aid Tin includes 27 of the most commonly used first-aid items. It's great for home, in the car or on the trail.
